con:method.name: getLearningStandard
con:method.con:description: Retrieve a single LearningStandard which is published by MoE/NZQA, professional associations or other interested parties.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Return nth page of results; default 0 `page=2`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: max
con:parameter.con:description: Maximum items per page, default 10,000; `max=100`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: unwrap
con:parameter.con:description: Remove top level wrapper from json results in single result reponses; `unwrap=1`

con:parameter.con:name: human
con:parameter.con:description: For code set fields, translate code to human readable form; `human=1`

con:parameter.con:name: field
con:parameter.con:description: Field to filter on when used with **pattern**; `field=FamilyName`

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-APIClientId
con:parameter.con:description:
Identifies the client making the API call to network infrastructure allowing WAFs to conduct rate limiting, gather usage statistics, etc. without having to unpack the username, subject claim or API key from the Authorization header.

Must be populated with the subject claim GUID from the access token in the Authorization header.

con:parameter.con:name: learningStandardRefId
con:parameter.con:description:
A unique identifier for the LearningStandard assembled by concatenating the following fields, with '-' between each piece:

  • LearningStandardFamily
  • Number
  • VersionNo

con:representation.con:description: successful operation
successful operation
con:representation.con:sampleContent: <LearningStandard> <LearningStandardRefId>NC-91165-2</LearningStandardRefId> <LearningStandardLocalId>91165-v2</LearningStandardLocalId> <Title>Chemistry</Title> <Number>91165</Number> <VersionNo>2</VersionNo> <Publisher> <RefId>cedf9eae-4358-408d-af57-ec0ea1b0d210</RefId> </Publisher> <Description>Demonstrate understanding of the properties of selected organic compounds</Description> <SubjectAreaList> <SubjectArea>CHEM</SubjectArea> </SubjectAreaList> <Status>PU</Status> <Credits>4</Credits> <Level>2</Level> <AssessmentType>INT</AssessmentType> </LearningStandard>

con:representation.con:description: Bad request - Request body invalid, Content, Accept, X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId, X-Edsby-APIClientId or other required Headers missing, etc.
Unauthorised - Authorization header missing, or contents incorrect.
Forbidden - API client has successfully authenticated, but is not authorised to make this API call
Not Found - resource in URL not found.
Failed to retrieve object(s).
Failed to retrieve object(s).
con:representation.con:sampleContent: <Error> <error>1009</error> <when>2020-07-16T20:00:46.000Z</when> <errorstr>Bad field: PersonInfo-Name-FamilyName: missing required field PersonInfo-Name-FamilyName (LastName) 'None'</errorstr> <localId>ST-002</localId> </Error>
